metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7021 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Elasticsearch versions before 7.10.0 and 6.8.14 have an information disclosure issue when audit logging and the emit_request_body option is enabled. The Elasticsearch audit log could contain sensitive information such as password hashes or authentication tokens. This could allow an Elasticsearch administrator to view these details.

criterions.comment: elasticsearch package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
